tickets.subject: Hey Vingle
tickets.description:
Hey again !
I sent this message almost year ago and Im really appreciate that you're trying your best, I reinstall this application and I really want to help you guys on the translations and sharing this awosem application in Saudi Arabia and as you can see my country is the best way to get your target ( check out for example twitter usesrs trending ) especially if you are working on the Arabic translations, I don't mind to help you guys on this, let me know if you are interesting .
Thank youMaha Abdulkareem

Sent from my Samsung device

-------- Original message --------
From: "q.m-91" <q.m-91@hotmail.com> 
Date: 06/03/2015  7:05 PM  (GMT+03:00) 
To: support.android@vingle.net 
Subject: Complaint !Â 

Sent from my Samsung device-------- Original message --------
From: "q.m-91" <q.m-91@hotmail.com> 
Date: 24/04/2015  3:14 AM  (GMT+03:00) 
To: support.android@vingle.net 
Subject: Vingle Android App Feedback 

------------------------
Vingle ID : orici
Model : Samsung SM-N9005
App Version : 2.2.0.5
------------------------


Hey Vingle,
This's Maha, I just wanted to say thank you for being understanding, Â you showed how you care about your costumers which is rarely seen in others apps it makes happy and I think all Arabs have the same feeling now I installed to enjoy it again.
Thanks ğŸ’œ

tickets.subject: RainyDayMarketing CPI Inquiry
tickets.description:
Hi,

I am reaching out to you on behalf of Seattle-based mobile ad network RainyDayMarketing in hopes of exploring possible partnership opportunities.

We are a MAT, Kochava and AppsFlyer-integrated network with global Android and iOS reach across all traffic models - from in-app display and video to app discovery and app wall/rewarded install. We would like to discuss the possibility of creating a campaign to drive CPI traffic to your app(s).  

Please take a moment to read a bit more about RainyDayMarketing and our traffic in our Media Kit here:
https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1txQKneqlkiv8PAx3_zPEifvF5IE-oGTIhzRq_TsJ9F4/edit?usp=sharing

Let me know your thoughts/questions and I'll respond right away. You can also create a new advertiser account in our platform here:
http://network.rainydaymarketing.com/advertiser_signup
I look forward to hearing from you and to possibly working together. I can also be reached on Skype at rainydayjasmine.

Thanks,


Jasmine

tickets.description:
This is a report from part time worker. 
Environment : iMac 27 5Kã€OS X 10.11.3ã€Safari 9.0.3 (11601.4.4)

Reproduce Bug : 
- Write a card, choose communities, and publish the card 

Expected Behavior : 
- Clip will be counted as 1. 
- Cards will be showed on the feed

Buggy Behavior 
- The communities that he chose were removed automatically when he published it(and it won't be showed on the feed). 
- The card(https://www.vingle.net/posts/1380102) is clipped by his collection but it shows "clip 0" (photo is attached)

tickets.raw_subject: Everything you wanted to know about UMEK but were afraid to ask

Hello!

 

Hope you're doing great!

 

A few weeks ago, UMEK posted a challenge for his fans on his Facebook - to come up with questions for a completely fan-generated interview. Here's the selection of the best questions, accompanied by UMEK's answers. Enjoy it.

 

Let me know if you'll publish the interview in your media so we can share it around!

 

Thanks for support and have a great weekend!

 

Best regards,

Kristian

Hi Vingle Inc,

               Hope you are going well.

I wanted to let you know that StartApp will introduce something absolutely amazing at MWC in Barcelona next week, that will change the way we currently look at mobile social data.  Could you please direct me to the right person to discuss this with?

Best Regards,

            Shivangi

tickets.subject: [Singapore Management University] Dinner Networking Session with Vingle
tickets.raw_subject: [Singapore Management University] Dinner Networking Session with Vingle
tickets.description:
Dear Sir/Mdm,

We write this letter to request a student class visit to your organization
We are currently taking an undergraduate course on Technopreneurship Study Mission (IS404) at the School of Information Systems in Singapore Management University, under the supervision of Associate Professor Benjamin Gan (benjamingan@smu.edu.sg<mailto:benjamingan@smu.edu.sg>). SMU is ranked as one of the top three national universities in Singapore with strong emphasis on encouraging entrepreneurship. We are planning to visit several startup organizations in Seoul, Korea to learn more about entrepreneurship. You can find out more about our course at the following wiki website: https://wiki.smu.edu.sg/is427/1516T2g1_South_Korea .
As Vingle is a global interest community for mobile and web platforms and it enables users to share thoughts and passions in any chosen language, we would like to learn more about your company history, vision and lessons, particularly how the founders came up with the idea of Vingle. We hope to interact with your staff, as well as learn the business model. This would allow us to understand how Vingle has been able to strategize itself to become one of the successful start-ups of today. It would certainly be of our honour to be able visit the Vingle HQ.
Our group which comprises a total of 26 people (24 students, 1 interpreter and 1 professor), would like to explore the possibility of a dinner networking session during the period of 25th April to 28 April 2016. The dinner networking session will last about 2 hours and the purpose is to have a Q&A (Question & Answer) discussion with your founder(s) or management. We are also open to do an internship for 2-3 months in Seoul if your company is interested.
We are extremely excited to hear from you to discuss further regarding the visit to Vingle HQ, and hope that this request will merit your most favorable response. For future communications, please feel free to contact me at + (65) 81254206 or wendy.tan.2012@sis.smu.edu.sg<mailto:wendy.tan.2012@sis.smu.edu.sg>. Alternatively, you may contact my teammate at pohhui.ng.2013@sis.smu.edu.sg<mailto:pohhui.ng.2013@sis.smu.edu.sg>.
Thank you very much and we hope to hear from you soon!
Best Regards,
Tan Wei Yan, Wendy
Singapore Management University
School of Information Systems
[wendy.tan.2012@sis.smu.edu.sg<mailto:wendy.tan.2012@sis.smu.edu.sg>]

tickets.subject: Hi, just finished "Carrie Underwood's Workout.."
tickets.description:
Hi,

I noticed you mentioned Carrie Underwood in your article: https://www.vingle.net/posts/655660-Carrie-Underwood-s-Workout-Moves-for-Miniskirt-Ready-Legs.

I'm writing to you because my team and I just spent the last few weeks designing a cool infographic where we compared the results from  IBM's Watson, "The Smartest Machine On Earth", against our best "human" transcriptionists in figuring out the song lyrics. This infographic features Taylor Swift and Van Halen, so we thought your readers might enjoy this fun visual as well. 

Are you able to let me know about your advertising options? We're particularly interested in guest posts (we would provide a short intro & infographic etc.)

Thanks,
Ashley Harris
Outreach Coordinator

tickets.description:
Dear PR manager 
  
Hi,my name is Yuka and I work in international marketing at Nyle Asia Pacific Inc. I'd like to feature Vingle. Very Community. in our media, Appliv.   
  
Appliv has succeeded in App reviewing market in Japan. Over 6 million users / month use it before downloading an App to encounter the exact one they are looking for.    
To expand our service worldwide, we've released it in English last year.  
http://app-liv.com/  
  
I'm now selecting the first 1000 apps that are differentiated from similar ones and offer great user experience in order to publish online review for free in English version of Appliv. I personally found your app in the Play Store, and get absorbed in it. It does deserve to get users' attention. 
 
 
Thank you for reading, I'm looking forward to your reply.  

Best Regards,   
Yuka 

[confidential requirement]
Please deal with all information of this email with attachments as a confidential information for privacy and security reasons.

â”  NYLE Inc. â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”

We are acknowledged by our clients for developing feature rich and extremely secure MOBILE APPS with enticing UI & UX.

tickets.subject: Hi, just finished "Carrie Underwood's Workout.."
tickets.description:
Forgive me for reaching out to you again, just wanted to check in...


On February 19, 2016 at 9:37 AM, ashley@connecttheory.com wrote:

Hi,

I noticed you mentioned Carrie Underwood in your article: https://www.vingle.net/posts/655660-Carrie-Underwood-s-Workout-Moves-for-Miniskirt-Ready-Legs.

I'm writing to you because my team and I just spent the last few weeks designing a cool infographic where we compared the results from  IBM's Watson, "The Smartest Machine On Earth", against our best "human" transcriptionists in figuring out the song lyrics. This infographic features Taylor Swift and Van Halen, so we thought your readers might enjoy this fun visual as well. 

Are you able to let me know about your advertising options? We're particularly interested in guest posts (we would provide a short intro & infographic etc.)

Thanks,
Ashley Harris
Outreach Coordinator
